Organize your browsing like never before with Tabs Group Helper, the ultimate tab management tool that streamlines your web experience. Tired of dealing with cluttered tabs and struggling to find the right ones? Say goodbye to tab chaos and say hello to seamless organization!

Key Features:
1. Auto Group Tabs by Domain: Tabs Group Helper intelligently organizes your open tabs based on their domain, creating logical groups for easy navigation. Say hello to a cleaner workspace and effortlessly switch between related tabs.
2. Intuitive Group Management: Easily customize and manage your tab groups. Rename, reposition, or merge groups with just a few clicks. Take full control of your browsing sessions and boost your productivity.
3. One-Click Group Creation: Create new tab groups with a single click, or let Tabs Group Helper do it for you. Enjoy the convenience of automated grouping while maintaining complete flexibility.

Tabs Group Helper revolutionizes the way you manage tabs, making your browsing experience more efficient and enjoyable. Say hello to an organized digital workspace that empowers you to conquer the web with ease.

Install Tabs Group Helper today and take control of your browsing like never before!
